He faces challenges in his work such as pests, plant diseases and changes in the weather.  His dream is to finish his studies and to buy his own home and farm.

Erwin Daniel likes taking part in sports.

loans.use: To buy agricultural supplies and fertilizers

loans.name: Ama

texts.en: Ama A. sells utensils at Abura. She is married and has three children. Her husband is a farmer. Ama has been selling utensils for some time now. She assists her husband in the payment of school fees and utility bills. Her loan will be used to expand her business. She hopes to use the new profits from her business to educate her children.

loans.use: To expand business selling utensils

loans.name: Araba

texts.en: Araba A. cooks banku at Abura for sale.  Araba is married and has two children. Her husband is a farmer. She assists her husband to provide the basic needs of the family. Her loan will be used to buy more maize to cook banku for sale. She plans to provide a meaningful education for her children with the additional income.

loans.use: to buy more maize to cook banku for sale

loans.name: Ekua

texts.en: Ekua Y. is single. She sells kenkey and utensils at Abura.  Ekua has received junior high education.  The sales she makes is used to pay for her accommodation and utility bills.  Her loan will be used to buy more utensils to expand her business. She hopes to use the new profits from her business to buy a piece of land.

loans.use: to buy more utensils to expand her business

loans.name: Theoneste

texts.en:
Theoneste is 33 years old and is married with two children aged between seven and eleven. He has a mill for getting more products such as: sorghum, rice and maize.  He employs two people to help him. Theoneste has an experience of five years in this business.  The hours of his business are from 7am to 4pm every day.

Theoneste has requested a loan to buy another new mill. With this expansion, he hopes to earn more profits and he will be able to renovate his house.

loans.use: To purchase another mill

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To buy blocks, iron, sand, gravel, cement and sheets of corrugated metal roofing

loans.name: Bernarda Guillermina

texts.es: Bernarda tiene 35 años, inicio este medio de vida que es una pulpería. Pues no es la primera vez que realiza financiamientos, ya que ha sido de gran provecho  para su negocio. Pues como toda mujer emprendedora ha salido adelante con sus dos negocios que son la pulpería y venta de comida y disfruta de este medio de vida, que es necesario para mantener a su familia. Es por este motivo que decide realizar este financiamiento con el fin de invertir en su negocio con ciertos productos como granos básicos, dulces, detergentes y otros productos para primordiales para la elaboración de comida.
texts.en: Bernarda is 35 years old and owns a grocery store.  This is not the first time that she has taken out a loan and her previous loans have been of great benefit to her business.  Like all enterprising women, she has made progress in her two businesses which are her grocery store business and her business selling meals.  Bernarda enjoys her work which is necessary to support her family.  For this reason, she is requesting this loan so that she can invest in her business with certain products such as basic grains, candies, detergent and other products which are essential for preparing meals.

loans.use: Working capital

loans.name: Filomena

texts.es: La Sra. Filomena tiene una tienda de barrio en una zona alejada de la ciudad, todos sus hijos están en el exterior y ella se quedó sola en la casa con la esposa de uno de sus hijos y dos nietos que se encuentran en edad escolar actualmente su única fuente de ingresos es la tienda que se encuentra bien surtida el dinero que se le otorga es para la compra de víveres para la tienda, la señora es de carácter muy jovial y es muy responsable,  en las pasadas fiestas navideñas estuvieron acompañándola todos sus hijos y ella se sintió muy feliz por este gesto, con el dinero del crédito comprara mercadería para surtir su tienda como azúcar, arroz y conservas, esta agradecida con la institución por el apoyo brindado.
texts.en:
Filomena has a neighborhood store in a remote area of the city.  All of her children live abroad and she is now alone at home with the wife of one of her sons and two school-age grandchildren.  Currently, Filomena's only source of income is her store which is well stocked.  The money which she is being given is for buying supplies for the store.

Filomena is a very jovial and responsible lady.  She spent the Christmas holidays with all of her children around her and this made her feel very happy.  She will use her loan money to buy merchandise to stock her store such as sugar, rice and canned food.  She is grateful to the institution for the support they have offered her.

loans.use: To buy sugar, rice, flour and canned food for her store

loans.name: Maximo Antonio

texts.es: Máximo Antonio tiene su negocio que es ofrecer los servicios de albañil y soldador. Hace más de 21 que tiene este negocio, pues siempre está pendiente de lo que su familia necesita pues lo aprendió desde muy joven y con el paso del  tiempo es que ha ido mejorando. No es la primera vez que realiza financiamientos ya que sabe que han sido muy beneficiosos para su actividad. Máximo es un padre responsable que siempre está pendiente de lo que su familia necesita. El financiamiento que solicita es para la compra de materia prima como herramientas, lentes, guantes, entre otras cosas necesarias.
texts.en:
Máximo Antonio's business is offering building and welding services.  He has owned his own business for more than 21 years and he is always looking out for his family's needs.  He learned his trade when he was very young and, over time, his business has improved.

This is not the first time that Máximo Antonio has taken out a loan and he knows that his previous loans have been very beneficial for his business.  He is a responsible father who is always looking out for his family's needs.  The loan that he is requesting will be used to buy raw materials such as tools, safety goggles, gloves and other necessary items.

loans.use: Working capital

loans.name: Abdulio

texts.es:
Don Abdulio de 47 años de edad, reside en San Francisco Gotera, departamento de Morazán, donde vive con su esposa y una hija de 4 años de edad, ellos alquilan vivienda y don Abdulio posee un taller de estructuras metálicas, dedicándose por más de 12 años a este oficio, realizando trabajos a clientes de diferentes puntos del departamento de Morazán, también en su casa realiza trabajos para aquellos clientes que viven cerca.
Él está solicitando un préstamo para la compra de hierro y un compresor, el hierro lo necesita para salir con un trabajo pendiente y el compresor pues es muy necesario para realizar todo el proceso en el taller, con esta inversión don Abdulio terminara de fabricar su trabajo pendiente y con la ayuda del compresor será más eficiente y  sus trabajos serán de calidad.
Sueña con ampliar el taller, contar con todas las herramientas necesarias para realizar un buen trabajo y proveer para su familia todo lo necesario así como también ahorrar para comprar un lugar propio donde vivir.
texts.en:
Mr Abdulio, age 47, lives in San Francisco Gotera, in the Morazan department, with his wife and one 4-year-old daughter. They rent their home, and Abdulio has a metal workshop. He has had this business for over 12 years. He makes items for customers from different areas of the Morazan department. He also makes items in his home for those customers who live nearby.

He is requesting a loan for the purchase of iron and a compressor. He needs the iron in order to finish a pending order, and the compressor is very necessary for the entire metalworking process. With this investment, Abdulio will finish his pending order, and with the help of the compressor he will be more efficient and his work will be of good quality.

He dreams of expanding his workshop and having all of the necessary tools for doing a good job. He also dreams of being able to provide his family with all of their necessities, and saving up to buy their own home.

loans.use: the purchase of iron and a compressor

loans.name: Chimboco Group

texts.es: El Grupo solidario Chimboco esta conformado por 3 integrantes todas ellas mujeres, la  representante del grupo es la Sra. Florencia,  vive en la zona D. Chimboco por eso el nombre del grupo, vive en la casa D. sus suegros, tiene tres hijos, ella venD. verduras en Cochabamba en uno e los mercados mas populares D. la ciudad, con el dinero del crédito comprara verduras por sacos,  es un   grupo  D. amigas, vecinas D. muchos años las otras dos clientes realizan la venta D. ropa y la otra Sra., realiza la venta D. dulces y refrescos , el préstamo lo invertirán para incrementar su capital D. trabajo.
texts.en:
The Chimboco solidarity group is maD. up of three members, all women. The group representative is Mrs. Florencia. She lives in the Chimboco zone, hence the name of the group. She lives in the home of her parents-in-law. She has three children and sells vegetables in Cochabamba, in one of the city's most popular markets. She will use this loan to buy bags of vegetables.

This is a group of long-time friends and neighbours. 

The other two members sell clothing, and the other married woman also sells candies and drinks. They will invest this loan to increase their working capital.

loans.use: the purchase of vegetables in bulk

loans.name: Janeth

texts.es:
La señora Janeth vive en casa de sus padres en la zona de Las Lomas, de la ciudad de La Paz, es casada y tiene cuatro hijos menores de edad, la señora es profesora de primaria y su esposo es carpintero en aluminio, con los ingresos que obtienen se mantienen, Es la primera ves que solicita un crédito.

El crédito que solicita será utilizado para la compra de material de construcción para efectuar arreglos en las habitaciones donde vive en la casa de sus padres.

Por el estudio social y económico, la señora califica para solicitar un crédito.
texts.en:
Mrs Janeth lives in her parents' home in the Las Lomas zone, in the city of La Paz. She is married and has four young children. She is an elementary school teacher and her husband is a carpenter who works with aluminium. Their incomes sustain them. This is the first time that she has requested a loan.

She will use this requested loan for the purchase of construction materials to make repairs to the rooms where they live in her parents' home.

The social and economic survey qualifies her to receive a loan.

loans.use: the purchase of construction materials for making repairs to one of the rooms in her parents' home.

loans.name: Jean D'amour

texts.en:
Jean d' Amour is 37 years old and is married.  He runs a butcher shop and he currently employs three people in his shop which is open from 7am to 6pm every day.    
                           
He has requested a loan to purchase more meat to sell.  Jean d'Amour hopes to earn more profit.  With any profit of this loan,he will increase his business and he plans to build his own house.that is the meat hanging from the line in the background, and where the client is pictured at.

loans.use: To purchase more meat to sell.

loans.name: Nicolasa

texts.es:
La señora Nicolasa vive en casa propia en la zona de Llojeta, de la ciudad de La Paz, es casada y tiene tres hijos menores de edad, la señora, así como su esposo son empleados en un ladrilleria de su zona, con los ingresos que obtienen se mantienen, en anterior crédito realizó la construcción de una habitación. La  señora se encuentra satisfecha con los créditos que le otorgamos.

El crédito que solicita será utilizado en la construcción de obra fina y carpintería de dos habitaciones que aún no están terminadas.

Por su antecedente histórico califica para obtener un nuevo crédito, se considera buen cliente.
texts.en:
Mrs Nicolasa lives in her own home in the Llojeta zone in the city of La Paz. She is married and has three young children. She and her husband are employed in a local brickwork company. Their income sustains them. With a previous loan, Nicolasa built a room. She is satisfied with the loans that we have authorized her.

The loan that she is now requesting will be used in the carpentry and finishing work for two rooms that are not yet completed.

She qualifies to receive a new loan because of her previous history; she is considered a good client.

loans.use: the cost to finish the finishing and carpentry work on two rooms of her house.

loans.name: Romer

texts.es:
Romer vive en casa de sus padres en la zona de Pasankeri, de la ciudad de La Paz, es casado y tiene dos hijos de 4 y 2 años, el señor es agricultor en la provincia y su esposa es comerciante, con los ingresos que obtienen se mantienen; con un anterior crédito realizó la construcción de una habitación. El señor se encuentra satisfecho con los créditos que le otorgamos.

Ahora necesita un crédito nuevo para la construcción de una cocina en la casa de sus padres, pues hasta la fecha cocinan en el patio de la casa.

Por su antecedente histórico califica para obtener un nuevo crédito, se considera buen cliente.
texts.en:
Romer lives in his parents' home in the Pasankeri zone, in the city of La Paz. He is married and has two children ages 4 and 2. He is a farmer, and his wife is a merchant. Their income sustains them. With a previous loan, Romer built a room. He is satisfied with the loans that we have authorized him.

Now he needs a new loan to build a kitchen in his parents' home; they currently cook in the patio of the home.

His previous history qualifies him for a loan; he is considered a good client.

loans.use: the cost of building a kitchen in his parents' home.

loans.name: Rosario Group

texts.es: El Banco de Emprendimiento Rosario Es grupo de 8 personas que conocen muy bien esta compuesto por 5 mujeres y 3 varones, presidenta es la Sra. Elba vive en casa propia por la urbanización los olivos sacaba, vive junto a su s 3 hijas y su esposo, la mencionada señora es muy buena líder y se dedica a la compra y venta de calzados de forma ambulante por toda la ciudad de Cochabamba con el dinero del crédito comprara zapatos por docenas, es una persona muy responsable y trabajadora que se levanta muy temprano para cocinar y dejar todo listo para sus hijas y después sale a vender su mercadería, de esta forma colabora con los gastos del hogar, esta agradecida con la instrucción por el apoyo brindado.
texts.en:
The Rosario Communal Bank is a group of 8 people who know each other very well. It is made up of 5 women and 3 men. Mrs Elba is the group's president. She lives in her own home in the Los Olivos development. She lives with her three daughters and her husband. She is a very good leader. Her business is buying and selling shoes on the streets throughout the city of Cochabamba.

She will use this loan to buy shoes by the dozen. She is a very responsible and hard-working person who gets up very early to cook and leave everything ready for her daughters. Then she goes out to sell her merchandise. This is how she contributes to the household costs. She is grateful to the institution for the support offered.

loans.use: the purchase of merchandise

loans.name: Amador Felipe

texts.es:
Amador Felipe Z. S. tiene 53 años de edad. Es casado Vive con la esposa y con el hijo, En el cantón Ventanas Provincia de los Ríos. Tiene 1 hijo.

Los miembros de la V.R.C. JESUS NOS AMA se encuentra ubicada en el Recinto los Amarillos, Perteneciente al Cantón Ventanas Esta Ventanilla se dedica a labores Agrícolas de ciclo corto siembra de maíz, arroz, esta actividad llevan mucho tiempo haciéndolo.

Amador Felipe se dedica a la agricultura a la siembra de maíz, arroz, cacao desde hace 5 años. Compra sus productos en Agripac Eicopa, y  vende en la feria en Ventanas.

Solicita el crédito para la compra de insumos agrícolas y fertilizantes para el cultivo de maíz, arroz, Con el apoyo del crédito le ayudaría económicamente para suplir sus necesidades. Enfrentan desafíos como las plagas y enfermedades y la variedad del clima. Su sueño es mejorar la calidad de vida.

Le gusta practicar el deporte.
texts.en:
Amador Felipe Z. S. is 53 years old.  He is married, and he lives with his wife and son in the Ventanas canton in the Los Ríos province.  He has one son.

The members of the “Jesús Nos Ama” (Jesus Loves Us) Communal Bank are located in the Amarillos precint in the Ventanas canton.  This bank devotes itself to growing short cycle corn and rice.  They have been doing this for a long time.

Amador Felipe has been growing corn, rice, and cacao for five years.  He buys his products at Agripac Eicopa, and he sells at the Ventanas fair.

He is requesting the loan to buy agricultural supplies and fertilizers for his corn and rice crops.  With the help he will be receiving through this loan, he will be able to acquire the necessities.  The challenges he faces are pest infestation, diseases, and climate changes.  

His dream is to improve their quality of life.

He likes to play sports.

loans.use: To buy agricultural supplies and fertilizers

loans.name: Luisa Argentina

texts.es: Luisa se dedica a la venta de ropa. Tiene más de 6 años, que tiene este negocio ya que ha sido muy necesario para mantener a su familia. Ella además trabaja en un local de comida rápida y los fines de semana tiene que levantarse temprano para  realizar su actividad.  Tiene 2 hijos de los cuales tiene que hacerse cargo, pues siempre ha sido una mujer muy responsable. El crédito será destinado para la compra de ropa variada ya que sus clientes le solicitan variedad por lo que es muy importante para satisfacer la demanda. Ella sueña con ampliar su negocio y cada día mejorar la condición de vida de su familia.
texts.en: Luisa sells clothing. She has had this business for more than 6 years and it has been necessary to support her family. She also works in a fast food restaurant and she has to get up early on the weekends to carry out this activity. She has 2 children that she takes care of as she has always been a very responsible woman. This loan is destined for the purchase of a variety of clothing since her customers ask her for variety and it is very important to satisfy the demand. She dreams of enlarging her business and improving the living conditions of her family each day.

loans.use: working capital

loans.name: Ernesto

texts.es:
El señor Ernesto vive en casa propia en la zona San Pedro, de la ciudad de La Paz, es viudo, el señor es rentista, con los ingresos que obtiene se mantiene. Con anteriores créditos realizo las refacciones en su vivienda, se encuentra satisfecho con los créditos que le otorgamos.

Este préstamo solicita para la compra de material para construir un muro divisorio que es muy necesario en su casa.

Por su estudio socio económico califica para obtener un nuevo crédito. Esta es la segunda vez que solicita crédito a través de Kiva.
texts.en:
Ernesto lives in his own house in the San Pedro area of the city of La Paz.  He is a widower, and he supports himself with the income he gets from his retirement.

With previous loans he repaired his house.  He is happy with the loans he was granted.

He is requesting this loan to buy material to build a dividing wall that is much needed at his house.

His socio economic evaluation qualifies him for a new loan.  This is the second time that he has requested a Kiva loan.

loans.use: Cost of materials to build a dividing wall at his house

loans.name: German

texts.es:
German vive en casa de sus padres en la zona Villa Tunari, área periférica de la ciudad de El Alto; es soltero. El señor es empelado publico, con los ingresos que obtiene se mantiene. Es la primera vez que presenta una solicitud de créditos. El motivo del crédito es la construcción de dos habitaciones nuevas en la casa de sus padres, para vivir más confortablemente.

Por su estudio socio económico califica para obtener un nuevo crédito
texts.en:
German lives in his parents’ house in the Villa Tunari zone, an outlying area of the city of El Alto.  He is single.  He supports himself with his income as a public employee.

This is the first time that he has requested a loan.  He wants the loan to build two new rooms in his parents’ house in order to live more comfortably.

His socio economic evaluation qualifies him for a loan.

loans.use: To build two rooms in his parents' house

loans.name: Shahnaz's Group

texts.en:
Shahnaz has applied for a loan from Kiva partner Asasah for her husband’s business of selling fruits. He operates his shop in the market through which he offers different seasonal fruits to his clients on cheap rates. Due to the freshness of the fruits, he earns good income every day which helps him to manage the financial circle of the family. With the loan, he will buy fresh seasonal fruits in bulk for his shop and increase his sales. 
Shahnaz supports her husband financially by doing sewing works. She has a good number of customers in the community who trusts her work and gives her regular orders. 
She is the mother of 8 children. Her 2 elder sons are involved in embroidery business and running an embroider shop in the market while 2 of her daughters operate a beauty salon. Her 3rd daughter sews clothes and helps her in completing the orders and remaining 3 are enrolled in a local school and are getting their education. 
Shahnaz belongs to Okara which is a small city located in Punjab, Pakistan and known for its agriculture industry. She has been living there with her family in the area of Kirpa ram in a 3 room brick house for past 30 years. 
She is a regular loan user of Asasah and this is her 4th loan request. In previous loan years, she has maintained a good credit behavior and never missed any meeting.  
Note: “In the photo, the lady with a book (called Asasah Passbook) is Shahnaz”.

loans.use: To buy seasonal fruits for fruit selling business

loans.name: Juan De Dios

texts.es:
Juan de Dios vive en casa propia en la zona de Pasankeri, de la ciudad de  La Paz, tiene dos  hijos, el señor es artesano -carpintero, con el  ingreso que obtiene se mantienen, en anterior crédito realizó la refaccionar dos habitaciones. 

El crédito será utilizado en la compra de una máquina de coser recta, para facilitar su trabajo de costuras.

Por su antecedente histórico califica para obtener un nuevo crédito, se considera buen cliente.
texts.en:
Juan de Dios lives in his own house in the Pasankeri zone in the city of La Paz.  He has two children.  He is a craftsman-carpenter.  He supports himself with the income that he gets.  He refurbished two rooms with his previous loan.

He will use the loan to buy an upright sewing machine to facilitate his sewing.  His previous history qualifies him for a new loan.  He is considered to be a good client.

loans.use: To buy a sewing machine for his craftsman's trade

loans.name: Angel

texts.es:
Angel vive en casa propia en la zona de Alto Lima, de la ciudad de  El Alto, es divorciado  y tiene un hijo, el señor comerciante, tiene una librería con el  ingreso que obtiene se mantienen. Es el primer crédito q tiene en IMPRO  de la misma manera con KIVA.

El crédito solicitado es para compra de hojas de carpetas, rollos de nylon de colores, y otros artículos necesarios para surtir su librería.
texts.en:
Angel lives in his own house in the Alto Lima zone of the city of El Alto.  He is divorced and has one child.

He is a merchant.  He has a bookshop, and he uses the income to support himself.

This is his first loan with Impro and his first with Kiva.

The requested loan is to buy notebook paper, rolls of different colors of nylon twine, and other items that are needed to stock his bookshop.

loans.use: To buy merchandise like notebook paper, nylon twine, and other items to sell in his bookstore

loans.name: Shahnaz's Group

texts.en:
Shahnaz lives in Okara which is a small city of Punjab, Pakistan and known for its agriculture and industry. She has been living there with her family in the area of Kirpa ram for past 9 years. 
She is a talented lady, expert in embroidery works. She collects orders from different clothes shops and fulfills the order on time to earn an income for the family. 
Her husband’s name is S. K. and he is a fruit seller by trade. He starts his work early in the morning and visits different streets of the city on his four-wheeled cart to sell his fruits. 
Shahnaz has given birth to 6 sons. She couldn’t provide them education facilities due to financial constraints.  
She has applied for a loan from Kiva partner Asasah for her husband’s business. With the loan he will buy fresh seasonal fruits in bulk to sell through his cart. He is operating this business for past 8 years and Shahnaz is very hopeful about his business growth. 
She is a new loan user of Asasah and this is her first loan application. She hopes that it will bring positive changes in her family’s living standard. 
Note: “In the photo, the lady with a book (called Asasah Passbook) is Shahnaz”.

loans.use: To buy fresh seasonal fruits for fruit selling business

loans.name: Juana Del Rosario

texts.es:
Juana casada, mujer trabajadora desde muy joven trabaja en la agricultura y tiene una pulpería en donde también vende una parte de sus cosechas. Planes a corto plazo es mejorar la infraestructura y cantidades de su negocio así también su finca. Se encontrado con dificultades por el mal estado de los caminos cuando sacan la producción en los cuales afectan algunos productos. El proyecto de establecer barreras vivas para proteger el cultivo de daños por los vientos y lluvia esta dentro de metas para este nuevo año de cultivo.
El préstamo que solicitad será invertido en la compra de insumos y fertilizantes para los cultivo dándole mantenimientos continuo. Agradece a la financiera por su apoyo para lograr un cultivo de naranja de mejor calidad.
texts.en:
Juana is married, and she is a hard-working woman.  She has worked in agriculture since she was very young.  She has a grocery store where she also sells part of her crops.  Her short term plans are to improve the infrastructure and to have greater quantities in her business and her farm.

She has encountered difficulties with the bad state of the roads.  This affects some of her products when she takes them on the roads.  Within her goals for this year is a project to establish live barriers to protect the crops from wind and rain damage.

The loan she is requesting will be used to buy supplies and fertilizers, which will provide continual maintenance for the crops.  She is grateful to the financial institution for its support in getting a better quality of orange crops.

loans.use: To buy supplies and fertilizers

loans.name: Basilia

texts.es:
Basilia vive en casa de sus padres  en la zona de  Senkata Pucarani II, de la ciudad de  El Alto, tiene dos hijas; la señora es portera y trabaja en la Unidad Educativa Pacajes, y  en el mismo colegio tiene un puesto de venta de dulces; los ingresos que obtiene de dichos trabajos mantienen a su familia.  Es el primer crédito que solicita de  IMPRO.
También el primer crédito con KIVA y el motivo del préstamo es que necesita comprar más dulces para ofrecer a sus clientes y así mejorar sus ingresos.
texts.en:
Basilia lives in her parents' home in Senkata Pucarani II district of the city of El Alto.  She has two daughters.  Basilia is a caretaker and works in the Pacajes Education Center.  She runs a stall selling sweet treats in the same school.  She uses the income that she makes from these jobs to support her family.

This is Basilia's first loan from IMPRO and her first KIVA loan.  She is requesting this loan as she needs to buy more sweet treats to offer her customers and thereby improve her income.

loans.use: To buy more sweet treats for her stall

loans.name: The Servants Of Jesus Group

texts.es:
LOS SIERVOS D. JESUS

María pertenece al grupo D. Alcancía Comunal “LOS SIERVOS D. JESUS” recientemente esta llevando el cargo D. presidenta del grupo esta conformado por 8 personas que viven en la misma calle y D. esa manera se unieron par poder crear La Alcancía Comunal.
María tiene 30 años D. edad y es madre casada tiene un hijo María tiene ya 2 años trabajando vendiendo productos naturales y medicinales y trabajando a podido pagar algunas deudas que tenia y tanbien cuidarse en lo que es su salud.
Si María tuviera un prestamos lo invertiría en agrandar el pedido D. sus productos.
Su sueño D. María es poner un puesto D. venta D. jugos en el mercado D. su localidad y con la ayuda D. Edaprospo-Prosperidad esperamos que lo logre.
texts.en:
The Servants of Jesus

Maria is a member of the communal bank named "The Servants of Jesus" and she has recently taken over as the leader of the group. The group is maD. up of 8 individuals who live along the same street, which is how the group was formed to make up this communal bank. 

Maria is 30 years old; she is married and the mother of one. Maria has been selling natural and medicinal products for two years and working in this business has allowed her to pay off some debts that she hand. She has also been able to cover some personal health expenses. 

Maria will invest her loan by placing larger orders for her products.

Maria's dream is to set up a stand in the market to sell juices. With the help of Edaprospo - Prosperidad she hopes to accomplish her goal.

loans.use: To purchase merchandise for resale.

loans.name: Juana

texts.es:
Juana vive en  la casa de su hermana en la zona de Villa Ingavi, de la ciudad de  El Alto, tiene un hijo, la señora es comerciante y se dedica a la venta de chuño y tunta (son derivados de la papa) en los restaurantes de la ciudad de El Alto. Con los ingresos que obtiene mantiene a su familia. Es el primer crédito con IMPRO, de la misma manera con KIVA.

El crédito será utilizado para la compra de chuño y tunta en mayores cantidades para satisfacer la demanda de sus clientes.
texts.en:
Juana lives in her sister's home in Villa Ingavi district, in the city of El Alto.  She has one child.  Juana is a saleswoman who sells 'chuño' and 'tunta' (potato derivatives) to restaurants in the city of El Alto.  She uses her income to support her family.

This is Juana's first loan from IMPRO and her first KIVA loan.  She will use her loan to buy 'chuño' and 'tunta' in larger quantities to meet her customers' demand.

loans.use: To buy 'chuño' and 'tunta' wholesale for her business selling these products to restaurants

loans.name: Irma

texts.es:
Irma vive en casa propia en la zona de Villa Ingavi, de la ciudad de  El Alto, y tiene un  hijo, la señora es comerciante; Irma vende ollas en las distintas ferias de le ciudad y los fines de semana viaja al departamento de Cochabamba para tambien vender sus ollas en las ferias de ese departamento. Con los ingresos que obtiene se mantienen; en anterior crédito lo utilizo para el aumento de capital. La señora se encuentra satisfecha con los créditos que le otorgamos.

Ahora necesita más capital para comprar más ollas, pues la demanda por el producto se ha incrementado y es una buena oportunidad para que Irma pueda mejorar sus ingresos.

Por su antecedente histórico califica para obtener un nuevo crédito, se considera buen cliente.
texts.en:
Irma lives in her own home in the Villa Ingavi zone of the city of El Alto. She has one child. She is a merchant; she sells pots in the various markets of the city, and on weekends she travels to the Cochabamba department to sell her pots there. Her income maintains her family. She used her previous loan for an increase in capital. She is satisfied with the loans that we have authorized her.

Now she needs more capital to buy more pots, since the demand for this product has increased and this is a good opportunity for Irma to increase her income.

Her previous history qualifies her to obtain a new loan; she is considered a good client.

loans.use: the purchase of more pots for sales in the El Alto and Cochabamba markets.

loans.name: Dionicia

texts.es:
Dionicia vive en casa propia en la zona de Villa Ingavi, de la ciudad de  El Alto, es casada y tiene dos hijos, la señora comerciante y se dedica a la venta de ollas de cocina; su esposo es empleado, con los ingresos que obtienen  mantienen a la familia.

 Un anterior crédito lo utilizo para el aumento de capital, y ahora necesita comprar más ollas pues la demanda es mucha. La señora se encuentra satisfecha con los créditos que le otorgamos.

Por su antecedente histórico califica para obtener un nuevo crédito, se considera buen cliente.
texts.en:
Dionicia lives in her own home in the Villa Ingavi zone, in the city of El Alto. She is married and has two children. She is a merchant and sells cooking pots. Her husband is employed, and their incomes maintain their family.

She used a previous loan for an increase in capital, and she now needs to buy more pots because the demand is great. She is satisfied with the loans that we have authorized her.

Her history qualifies her to receive a new loan. She is considered a good client.

loans.use: the purchase of a greater quantity of cooking pots to satisfy her customers' demand.

loans.name: Pablo

texts.es: Pablo vive en casa de sus suegros en la zona de San Luís 2 Do Charapaqui, de la ciudad de  El Alto, tiene tres hijos, el señor es artesano –costurero, con el  ingreso que obtiene se mantienen. Es el primer crédito que tiene con IMPRO  de la misma manera con KIVA. Dicho crédito lo necesita para la compra de materia prima, como ser telas, hilos, forros, etc.
texts.en: Pablo lives in the home of his parents-in-law in the San Luís 2 Do Charapaqui zone, in the city of  El Alto. He has three children and is a craftsman-sewer. He supports his family with his income. This is his first loan with IMPRO and KIVA. He needs this loan for the purchase of basic materials, such as fabric, thread, lining, etc.

loans.use: the purchase of fabric, thread, and lining for his craft-garment business.

loans.name: Calixto

texts.es:
Calixto vive en casa de su sobrina en la zona  El Progreso, de la ciudad de  El Alto, es casado y tiene tres hijos, el señor es Artesano- Carpintero  y su esposa es artesana, con los ingresos que obtiene se mantienen, es el primer crédito en IMPRO  también con KIVA.

El préstamo será utilizado para la compra de madera Nogal, muy buena madera para la fabricación de muebles y productos artesanales de madera.
texts.en:
Calixto lives in his niece's home in the El Progreso zone of the city of El Alto. He is married and has three children. He is a craftsman-carpenter and his wife is a craftswoman. They support themselves with their incomes. This is his first loan with IMPRO and KIVA.

He will use this loan for the purchase of Nogal wood, which is a very good wood for making furniture and wooden craft products.

loans.use: the purchase of Nogal wood for furniture and craft products.

loans.name: Shazia's Group

texts.en:
Shazia lives in Shaiwal which is a small city of Pakistan and known for its agriculture industry. She lives there with her family in the area of Muhallah noor park in a two room brick house for over five years. 
She is 32 years old, married to M. E. who has a crockery selling business. He operates a small shop in the market from where he sells different kinds of crockery such as steel, glass and plastic. He started this business four years ago and it is working well since then. 
Shazia herself is a housewife, prefers to stay at home and does her household responsibilities. Shazia has given birth to seven children: three sons and four daughters.  Only three of them are able to attend school while others stay at home. It is not possible for Shazia to provide education facilities to all of her children. 
She has applied for a loan from Kiva partner Asasah for her husband’s business. With the loan he will buy crockery such as glass, dinner sets etc and put them to his shop for selling. 
Shazia is very confident that her husband will successfully be able to improve the financial condition of his business and as a result she will be able to send her remaining children to school. 
She is a regular loan user of Asasah and this is her 2nd loan application. In previous loan year, she has established a good credit behavior and never missed any meeting.

loans.use: To buy crockery for selling

loans.name: Bushra's Group

texts.en:
Bushra is a citizen of a city named Sahiwal which is located in Punjab Pakistan and known for its agriculture industry. She lives there in the area of Muhallah noorpark with her family for over many years. 
She is a housewife and does her household responsibilities by staying at home.  She has 2 children, both are sons and studying in a local school. Bushra remains worried about the future of her children that’s why she wants her husband to improve his business so that she be able to send her children to better school. 
Bushra’s husband operates a tyre shop in the market where he sells tyres of motorbikes to his customers.  
Bushra has applied for a loan from Kiva partner Asasah to financially assist her husband in his business. With the loan, he will buy good number of tyres and put them in his shop to sell.  
Bushra is hopeful that a loan investment will help her husband in making more income from his tyres selling business and her family will be able to live a better standard of life in result. 
She is a regular loan user of Asasah and this is her 3rd loan application. In previous loan years, she has proved herself as a responsible client and always paid her installments on time.

loans.use: To buy motorbike tyres for selling

loans.name: Consuelo

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal “SEÑOR DE TORRECHAYOC”; El banco está ubicado en el distrito de Urubamba, perteneciente a la provincia de Urubamba y departamento de Cusco.

La socia es la Sra. Consuelo; ella tiene 55 años de edad y es soltera y tiene 2 hijos; La socia alterna sus actividades diarias con el negocio de tienda de abarrotes, ella vende productos de primera necesidad como arroz, azúcar, leche y fideos, la socia quiere ampliar y mejorar el negocio de tienda de abarrotes. La socia solicita el préstamo para comprar productos para la tienda de abarrotes.   
             
 La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
Here is a member of the communal bank named "Lord of Torrechayoc". The communal bank is located in the district of Urubamba, belonging to the province of Urubamba in the department of Cusco. 

Her name is Consuelo. She is 55 years old, she is single and she has 2 children. She alternates her daily activities with her convenience store business. She sells basic needs products, such as rice, sugar, milk, and pasta. She wants to expand and improve her convenience store business. She requests a loan to purchase products for her store. 

She is very happy to receive a loan and she is committed to the payment terms.

loans.use: To purchase merchandise for her grocery store.

loans.name: Candida Rosa

texts.es: Candida Rosa tiene 46 años es casada y tiene tres hijos, de los cuales uno ya es mayor de edad y vive aparte. La señora es dueña de una pulpería, la cual está localizada en su casa de habitación, además de esto también distribuye productos de medicina natural y también oferta servicios de masajes al cliente. Candida  tiene 15 años de tener la pulpería, la cual en dio inicio con el apoyo de su familia que fueron los que facilitaron el capital inicial de trabajo y fue con el tiempo que fue reinvirtiendo hasta poder hacer más grande el negocio. Ella solicita el crédito para comprar mercancías tanto para la pulpería como para la venta de medicina natural. Sus sueños por el momento son ampliar el negocio, de tal manera que permita mejorar las condiciones del hogar y en especial de sus hijos.
texts.en:
Candida Rosa is 46, married, and has three children. One of her children is grown and lives independently. Candida owns a general store, located in her home. She also distributes natural medical products and offers a massage service.

She has had her general store for 15 years after starting it with the support of her family, who provided the initial working capital. With time, she has been re-investing it in order to make her business bigger. She is requesting this loan to buy merchandise for her general store and her natural medicines sales.

Her current dreams are to expand her business, which will allow her to improve the conditions of her home and especially the living conditions of her children.

loans.use: working capital

loans.name: Wallan's Group

texts.en:
Wallan resides in Muhallah N. park which is a small housing colony of city Sahiwal. Sahiwal is a city located in Punjab, Pakistan and known for its agriculture industry. She lives there with her family in a 2 room brick house for over 21 years. 
She is 43 years old housewife, prefers to stay at home and does her household responsibilities. She got married to M. A. who is a rickshaw driver. He provides transport services to the passengers and drops them to their destinations.  
Wallan is the mother of 2 sons. Both are illiterate and do work to financially support the family. Her elder son is also a driver by profession while younger one has a construction supplies selling business. 
Wallan has applied for a loan from Kiva partner Asasah for her husband. With the loan he will buy a rickshaw. Currently he drives rickshaw on rent and almost one third of his income goes to the rickshaw owner. By purchasing his own rickshaw he will be able to work without any time restrictions and he will never be bound to share his earn amount with anyone. 
Wallan is hopeful that her husband’s business will grow by purchasing a rickshaw which will be resulted in better financial living standard of her family. 
She is a regular loan user of Asasah and this is her 2nd loan application. In previous loan year, she has established a good credit behavior and never missed any meeting.

loans.use: To buy a rckshaw for driving business

loans.name: Esteban

texts.es:
El socio pertenece al banco comunal “SEÑOR DE TORRECHAYOC”; El banco está ubicado en el distrito de Urubamba, perteneciente a la provincia de Urubamba y departamento de Cusco.

El socio es el Sr. Esteban; el tiene 68 años de edad y es casado y tiene 4 hijos; El socio alterna sus actividades diarias con el negocio de venta de carne y también se dedica al negocio de tienda de abarrotes, el socia atiende desde las 7:00 a.m hasta las 8:00 p.m y por medio de estos negocios la socia saca adelante a sus hijos, el socio quiere ampliar y mejorar el negocio de venta de carne y tienda de abarrotes. El  socio solicita el préstamo para comprar productos para la tienda de abarrotes y comprar carne al por mayor.

El socio está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
The member belongs to the Señor de Torrechayoc communal bank. The bank is located in the Urubamba district, belonging to the Urubamba province and the department of Cusco.

The member is Mr Esteban. He is 68, married, and has 4 children. He divides his time between his daily chores and his meat sales business, as well as his grocery store. He works in his grocery store from 7:00 am to 8:00 pm. Through these businesses, he gets his children ahead. He wants to expand and improve his meat business and his grocery store. He is requesting this loan to buy products for his grocery store and to buy wholesale meat.

He is happy to have this loan and promises to honour the payments of his quotas.

loans.use: The member is requesting this loan to purchase products for his grocery store, and to buy meat wholesale.

loans.name: Elva

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal “SEÑOR DE TORRECHAYOC”; El banco está ubicado en el distrito de Urubamba, perteneciente a la provincia de Urubamba y departamento de Cusco.

La socia es la Sra. Elva; ella tiene 40 años de edad y es casada y tiene 2 hijos; La socia alterna sus actividades diarias con el negocio de venta de cuyes, la socia tiene un galpón de cuyes, ella vende en forma independiente ofreciendo a diferentes lugares como municipalidades y al público en general, la socia quiere ampliar el negocio de venta de cuyes. La socia solicita el préstamo para comprar cuyes al por mayor.  
            
 La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
The member belongs to the Señor de Torrechayoc communal bank. The bank is located in the Urubamba district, belonging to the Urubamba province in the department of Cusco.

The member is Mrs. Elva. She is 40, married, and has 2 children. She divides her time between her daily activities and her guinea pig sales business. She has a shed for her guinea pigs, and sells them independently in different locations such as cities and to the general public. She wants to expand her guinea pig business. She is requesting this loan to buy guinea pigs wholesale.

She is happy to have this loan and promises to honour the payments of the quotas.

loans.use: The member is requesting this loan for buying guinea pigs wholesale.

loans.name: Rosa

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal “SEÑOR DE TORRECHAYOC”; El banco está ubicado en el distrito de Urubamba, perteneciente a la provincia de Urubamba y departamento de Cusco.

La socia es la Sra. Rosa; ella tiene 60 años de edad y es casada y tiene 3 hijos; La socia alterna sus actividades diarias con el negocio de venta de helados, ella tiene una heladería y también es cesante de educación, la socia tiene una pequeña tienda de helados donde atiende desde las 8.00 a.m hasta las 6:00 p.m, la socia quiere ampliar el negocio de venta de helados. La socia solicita el préstamo para comprar insumos para hacer los helados.       

 La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
The member belongs to the Señor de Torrechayoc communal bank. The bank is located in the Urubamba district, belonging to the Urubamba province in the department of Cusco.

The member is Mrs. Rosa. She is 60, married, and has 3 children. She divides her time between her daily activities and her ice cream business. She has an ice cream store, and she is also a retired teacher. She has a small ice cream store where she works from 8:00 am to 6:00 pm. She wants to expand her ice cream sales business. She is requesting this loan to buy ingredients for making ice cream.

She is happy to have this loan and promises to honour the payments of the quotas.

loans.use: the member is requesting this loan to purchase ingredients for making ice cream.

loans.name: Ivonne De La Cruz

texts.es: Ivonne De La Cruz tiene 25 años, su actividad es la crianza y engorde de pollos. Hace más de 3 años que tiene este negocio, inicio este negocio siguiendo los pasos de su Mama ya que anteriormente ella era quien se hacía cargo de esta actividad, siempre ha sido una mujer muy emprendedora y disfruta de su medio de vida. El crédito que está solicitando es para la compra de material de construcción para aumentar el tamaño de la galera en donde tiene a los pollos. Sueña con llegar a producir un mayor volumen de pollos y así mejorar las condiciones del negocio de su familia.
texts.en:
Ivonne De La Cruz is 25. Her business is raising and fattening chickens. She has had this business for over three years. She started this business following in her mother's footsteps, since this was previously her mother's job. Ivonne has always been an enterprising woman and she benefits from this lifestyle. 

She will use this requested loan for the purchase of construction materials to increase the size of the pen where she has her chickens. She dreams of producing a greater volume of chickens in order to improve her family's business.

loans.use: working capital

loans.name: Cristina

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal “SEÑOR D. TORRECHAYOC”; El banco está ubicado en el distrito D. Urubamba, perteneciente a la provincia D. Urubamba y departamento D. Cusco.

La socia es la Sra. Cristina; ella tiene 58 años D. edad y es casada y tiene 4 hijos; La socia alterna sus actividades diarias con el negocio D. tienda D. abarrotes, la socia venD. productos D. primera necesidad, ella trabaja desD. las 5:00 a.m hasta las 11:00 p.m, por medio D. este negocio la socia saca adelante a sus hijos, la socia quiere ampliar la tienda D. abarrotes. La socia solicita el préstamo para comprar productos para la tienda D. abarrotes como arroz, azúcar, galletas, fideos, aceites al por mayor. 
   
 La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos D. su cuota.
texts.en:
The member belongs to the community bank "Señor D. Torrechayoc". The bank is located in the district of Urubamba which belongs to the province of Urumbaba and the department of Cusco.

The member is Cristina. She is 58 years old, is married and has four children. She alternates her daily activities with her grocery store business. She sells food staples and works from 5:00 am until 11:00 pm. Through this business the member is able to raise her children. She wants to expand her store. She is requesting this loan to buy products for her grocery store such as rice, sugar, cookies, pasta and oils in wholesale quantities. 

The member is happy for this loan and promises to make her loan payments.

loans.use: Purchase supplies for her grocery store such as rice, sugar, cookies, pasta and oils in wholesale quantities.

loans.name: Neyler

texts.es:
El socio pertenece al banco comunal “SEÑOR DE TORRECHAYOC”; El banco está ubicado en el distrito de Urubamba, perteneciente a la provincia de Urubamba y departamento de Cusco.

El socio es el Sr. Neyler; el tiene 41 años de edad y es casado y tiene 2 hijos; El socio alterna sus actividades diarias con el negocio de venta de ropa americana, el socio tiene dos tiendas en la provincia de Urubamba, el socio atiende desde las 8:00 a.m hasta las 7:00 p.m, el socio quiere ampliar y mejorar la tienda de ropa americana. El  socio solicita el préstamo para comprar ropa americana como pantalones, polos, casacas y zapatos.

El socio está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
The member belongs to the community bank "Señor de Torrechayoc". The bank is located in the district of Urubamba which belongs to the province of Urumbaba and the department of Cusco.

The member is Neyler. He is 41 years old, is married and has two children. He alternates his daily activities with his business of selling american clothing. He has two stores in the province of Urubamba which he attends to from 8:00 am until 7:00 pm. He wants to expand and improve his business of selling american clothing. He is requesting this loan to purchase american clothing such as pants, polo shirts, coats and shoes. 

The member is happy for this loan and promises to make his loan payments.

loans.use: Purchase american clothing such as pants, polo shirts, coats and shoes.

loans.name: Abel

texts.es:
El socio pertenece al banco comunal “SEÑOR DE TORRECHAYOC”; El banco está ubicado en el distrito de Urubamba, perteneciente a la provincia de Urubamba y departamento de Cusco.

El socio es el Sr. Abel; el tiene 33 años de edad y es soltero; El socio alterna sus actividades diarias con el trabajo en el sector educación, el es profesor del nivel primario y también es propietario de una escuela particular en el distrito de Calca llamado Signos de Fe, el socio quiere ampliar el negocio de la escuela educativa y mejorar la educación. El  socio solicita el préstamo para implementar la escuela educativa.

El socio está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
The member belongs to the community bank "Señor de Torrechayoc". The bank is located in the district of Urubamba which belongs to the province of Urumbaba and the department of Cusco.

The member is Abel. He is 33 years old and is single. He alternates his daily activities with work in the educational sector. He is a grammar school teacher and also owns a private school in the Calca district called "Signos de Fe" (Signs of Faith). He wants to expand his school and improve the education. He is requesting the loan to implement the educational school. 

The member is happy for this loan and promises to make his loan payments.

loans.use: To implement an educational school.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: Working capital.

loans.name: Astrid Evelyn

texts.es:
La señora Astrid Evelyn M. y el señor Julio Cesar Fuentes  tiene dos hijos que actual mente están estudiando y necesitan pagar la colegiatura de este semestre para que puedan terminar el año escolar.  
Solicitan un préstamo ya que no cuenta con el dinero necesario para pagar en la escuela y desean que sus hijos sigan estudiando. 
Daña Astrid Evelyn trabaja  como niñera particular y con este ingreso pagaran el crédito  ya que Don  Julio Cesar se encargara de los gastos familiares con el sueldo que recibe de su trabajo que tiene en una agencia aduanal en el departamento de tramitador.
texts.en:
Astrid Evelyn M. and Julio Cesar Fuentes have two children who are in school and they need to pay this semester's tuition fees in order to complete the school year. 

They request a loan because they do not have the necessary funds to pay these tuition fees and they wish to keep their kids in school.

Astrid Evelyn is a private daycare worker and with this loan she will pay her loan. Julio Cesar takes care of the family's expenses with the income he earns working at a custom's office in the department of labor.

loans.use: To pay for school fees.

loans.name: Hipolito

texts.es: Hipolito tiene 56 años, su actividad es la compra y venta de ropa. Hace más de 10 años que tiene este negocio, por cuenta propia él decidió iniciar este medio de vida y lo tiene de manera ambulante la mayoría de sus clientes siempre llegan a preguntarle por la gran variedad de ropa que ofrece. Inicio este medio de vida porque como padre responsable tenía que hacerse cargo de su familia, siempre le ha gustado recorrer las calles de sol a sol a pesar de las dificultades que ha enfrentado lo ha mantenido activo. El financiamiento es para la compra materia prima como pantalones, camisas, faldas, vestidos entre otros.
texts.en: Hipolito is 56 years old and he buys and sells clothing. He has had his business for more than 10 years. He started out on his own initiative in this business. He is an itinerant merchant and the majority of his clients approach him to buy from him a wide assortment of clothing. He started out this business because, as a responsible father, he needed to support his family. He has always enjoyed traveling the streets from area to area and despite the difficulties he has faced he has still managed to be keep active. This loan will be used to purchase merchandise such as pants, shirts, skirts, and dresses, among other items of clothing.

loans.use: To purchase articles of clothing for resale.

loans.name: Azra's Group

texts.en:
Azra is 40 years old active lady, manages her household works in an effective way. She lives with her family in a small city called Sahiwal. Sahiwal is famous for its agriculture industry and locates in Pakistan.  
She is married to A. L. who has a business of selling crockery. He has a little shop in the market through which he offers his customers different kind of crockery like dinner sets, glass sets etc. He is operating this business for over 20 years and well known among his customers for his good behavior and quality items. 
Azra is the mother of 2 daughters; both are enrolled in a local school and are studying in 5th grade. 
She has applied for a loan from Kiva partner Asasah for her husband’s business. With the loan he will purchase more crockery to put in his shop for selling. 
Azra is hopeful that an investment will take her husband’s business to more profitable position and in result she will be able to provide better quality education to her daughers. 
She is a regular loan user of Asasah and this is her fourth loan application. In previous loan years, she has maintained a good credit behavior and never missed any meeting.

loans.use: To buy crockery to sell

loans.name: Jaime Roberto

texts.es:
Jaime comerciante, casado hombre trabajador inicio con el apoyo de su esposa sus planes de futuro para con su familia es mejorar la condiciones de vida, la infraestructura para ofrecerle protección. Ha tenido dificultades con el alza en los precios de la canasta básica y con mucho esfuerzo y dedicación han sido superados.
Ampliar el local donde esta su negoció es de necesidad y símbolo de buena administración por tal ese es el segundo paso hacer. 
El préstamo solicitado será invertido en la compra de abarrotes como: arroz, frijoles, azúcar, aceite, jabón de trasto, baño y de lavar entre otros productos.  Obteniendo mayores ventas y  mayor clientela.
texts.en:
Jaime is a merchant, and he is married.  He is a hard-working man.  His future plan, with his wife’s support, is to improve his family’s living conditions.  He plans to improve the infrastructure to provide his family with protection.

He has had difficulties with the rise in cost of the “canasta basica” (Traditionally, canasta basica has represented the minimum food and household items required for a family over a one-month period).  With great effort and dedication he has overcome the difficulties.  

Expanding his business site is a necessity, and it is a symbol of good administration.  That is why it is the second step to take.

He will use the requested loan to buy groceries like rice, beans, sugar, oil, dish soap, bath soap, and other products.  That way he will have greater sales and more customers.

loans.use: To buy groceries

loans.name: Mario Francisco

texts.es:
Mario casado, hombre de familia, trabajador y emprendedor mejorar las condiciones de vida es un plan que día a día pone en práctica para llegar a cumplir completamente. Tiene su propio negocio venta de abarrotes y más. Se le ha presentado dificulta con el alza de precios. Inicio el negocio tiempo atrás con el apoyo de su familia. 
Agradece a la financiera por el préstamo otorgado que se invertirá en la compra de: arroz, frijoles, azúcar, aceite, jabón de lavar y de trasto, detergente, cloro, pasta dental, fosforo y otros. Agradece a al financiera ya que con este préstamo obtendrá benefició de mayores variedad de producto.
texts.en:
Mario is married, and he is a hard-working and enterprising family man.  He works day to day in order to achieve his plan to improve his living conditions.  

He has his own business selling groceries and other things.  He has encountered difficulty with the rise in prices.  He started the business a while ago with support from his family.

He is grateful to the financial institution for the loan he was granted.  He will use it to buy rice, beans, sugar, oil, bath soap, dish soap, detergent, bleach, toothpaste, matches, and other items.  He is grateful to the financial institution because he will, through the loan, get the benefit of a greater variety of products.

loans.use: To buy grocery products

loans.name: Naseem's Group

texts.en:
Naseem belongs to Sahiwal which is a small city of Punjab Pakistan and known for its agriculture industry. She has been living there with her family in the area of Noor park in a two room brick house for over 20 years. 
She is married to G. R. and a mother of none. Her husband works in the factory for a reasonable income. 
A talented lady Naseem, owns and operates her sewing business at her home. She does this work to share the financial burden with her husband. She sews clothes for her neighboring customers and earns good by completing them on time. She learnt this art from her mother and now can sew designer and non designer dresses easily. Her customers satisfied with her work and prefer to approach her to sew their regular wearing dresses as well. 
She has applied for a loan from Kiva partner Asasah for her sewing business. With the loan, she will buy a new sewing machine because his previous machine has become old and not producing a quality work. The new machine will help her in maintaining the quality of her sewing and in completing the orders on time. 
She is a regular loan user of Asasah and this is her 2nd loan application. In previous loan year, she has established a good credit behavior and never missed any meeting.  She is hopeful that an investment will enable her to get positive results from her business. 
Note: "In the photo, the lady with a book (called Asasah Passbook) is Naseem".

loans.use: To buy a new sewing machine for sewing business

loans.name: Bernarda Lila

texts.es: Bernarda mujer trabajadora, casada, profesora de profesión. Trabaja como auxiliar de direción en un colegio, su esposo albañil. Juntos le ofrece lo mejor a su familia.  Tiene como prioridad la mejora de su vivienda. Para cumplir con su proyecto de infraestructura ha encontrado dificultades falta de financiamientos para la compra de los materiales de construcción. Gracias a la financiera por el apoyo que se le ofrece con este préstamo. Con el préstamo que solicitad compra materiales de construcción como: Cemento, bloques, hierro, laminas de zinc, arena, reglones de madera, clavos de acero entre otros materiales. Obteniendo protección y comodidad a su vez.
texts.en:
Bernarda is a hard-working, married woman who is a teacher by profession.  She works as a language assistant and her husband is a construction worker.  Together they offer their family the best.

Bernarda's priority is improving her home.  In finishing her infrastructure project, she has come up against difficulties in that she lacks the money she needs to buy  building supplies.  She thanks the institution for the support that they are offering her with this loan.  She will use her loan to buy building supplies such as cement, blocks, iron, sheets of metal, sand, wood, steel nails, etc.  This will provide her with both protection and comfort.

loans.use: To buy building supplies

loans.name: Emmanuel

texts.es:
El señor Emmanuel Marques esta agradecido por su cooperación en el anterior crédito el cual podo poner la protecciones a su casa. 
Esta nuevamente solicitando un préstamo para poder construir la barda alrededor de su vivienda, por el momento no cuenta con el dinero necesario para realizar la mejora
Planea pagar el crédito con el ingreso que obtiene de su empleo como medico de una clínica particular.
Desea la seguridad y la protección de su familia cuando el no este en casa. 
La persona que aparece en la foto es la señora Sandra Luz Quezada quien es la esposa del señor Emmanuel, ya que el se encontraba en su trabajo el día de la visita y fue imposible que nos atendiera.
texts.en:
Emmanuel Marques is grateful for your help with his previous loan, which which he was able to use to install security measures in his home.

He is now requesting a loan to build a fence around his property, at the moment he does not have the money necessary to make that improvement.

He plans to pay back the loan with his earnings from his job as a medic at a clinic.

He wants to give his family security and protection when he is not at home.

The person in the photo is Sandra Luz Quezada, who is Emmanuel's wife, since he was at work the day of the visit and it was impossible for him to meet with us.

loans.use: Construction on the fence around the house

loans.name: Diego Manuel

texts.es: Diego Manuel tiene 56 años, su actividad es la venta de lubricantes. Hace más de 4 años que tiene este negocio, tiene 2 hijos menores de edad a su cargo. Inicio cuando invirtió en unos cuantos ahorros que tenia ya que de manera ambulante que inicio este medio de vida con el tiempo fue que decidió establecerse en su hogar donde la mayoría de sus clientes saben su ubicación. El financiamiento es para la compra de lubricantes ya que la mayoría de sus vecinos solicitan los productos que Diego ofrece.
texts.en: Diego Manuel is 56 years old and sells lubricants. He has had this business for more than 4 years, and he has 2 young children who he cares for. He began when he invested some of his savings. Since he began this way of life as a street vendor, with time he decided to establish his business at home, where most of his customers know his location. The loan is for the purchase of lubricants, since most of his neighbors request the products that Diego offers.

loans.use: working capital

loans.name: Rosa Mercedes

texts.es: Rosa tiene 32 años de edad cuenta con domicilio propio ubicado en Manzanilla vive con su esposo y sus dos menores hijos de 03 y 02 años de edad Rosa se inicio aproximadamente cuatro años en el negocio de la venta de ropa y juguetes recibe pedidos de mercaderia de sus vecinos ella trabaja con las dos modalidades que son al contado y al crédito adicionalmente presta servicios en el wawa wasi Virgen de Chapi su esposo labora como obrero de campo ellos sueñan con capitalizarse en su negocio,arreglar su vivienda y comprarse un auto tico, el financiamiento otorgado sera destinado para la compra de mercaderia.
texts.en:
Rosa is 32 and has her own home in Manzanilla. She lives with her husband and two young children ages 3 and 2. Rosa started her clothing and toys sales business approximately 4 years ago. She takes orders for merchandise from her neighbours and accepts two types of payment--cash and credit. She also volunteers at the Wawa Wasi Virgen de Chapi.

Her husband works as a field labourer. They dream of getting a lot out of their business, fixing up their home and buying a tico vehicle.
This loan will be used for the purchase of merchandise.

loans.use: the purchase of merchandise

loans.name: Los Amigos Victoriosos Group

texts.es:
el grupo Los Amigos Victoriosos lo integran 5 personas y todos residentes de la aldea Agua Fria en el sector de Nacaome, Valle. a continuacion se detalla lo que ellos relizan para ganarse la vida diariamente:
La joven Sandra Lizeth A. se dedica a la venta de ropa usada y venta de tortillas, la señora Leonarda García se dedica a la venta de cuajada, queso y leche, tiene su ganando del cual saca la leche para fabricar sus productos.
el sr. Lazaro Antonio D. y el sr. Jose David E. se dedican a la fabricacion de ladrillos, producen en cantidades grandes para vender al por mayor.
el sr. Jose Santos M. se dedica a la venta de rosquillas, quesadillas y queso 
Todos ellos son personas muy trabajadoras y luchadoras, sus negocios son muy conocidos por los pobladores del sector y de los lugares vecinos.
el credito lo utilizaran para la compra de fardos de ropa usada, tierra, arena, leña, queso, pastillas de cuajo, cal, agua, manteca, maiz, queso. 

el sr. Lazaro y Jose E. necesitan reparar el horno en donde hacen la produccion de ladrillos.

el mayor anhelo de todos es que sus negocios crezcan mas y que puedan aperturar nuevos mercados.

las ganancias las necesitan para salir adelante con sus familias.
texts.en:
The Los Amigos Victoriosos ["The Victorious Friends"] group is made up of five people, all residents of the Agua Fria hamlet in the Nacaome, Valle sector. The following is a description of what they do to earn their daily bread:

Young Sandra Lizeth A. sells used clothing and tortillas. Mrs. Leonarda G. sells curds, cheese and milk. She has livestock and gets her milk from these animals to make her products.

Mr. Lazaro Antonio D. and Mr. Jose David E. make bricks, producing large quantities to be sold wholesale.
Mr. Jose Santos M. sells doughnuts, quesadillas and cheese.

They are all very hard-working people. Their business are very well-known by the people in their sector and in the neighbouring areas.
They will use this loan for the purchase of bundles of used clothing, earth, sand, firewood, cheese, rennet tablets, lime, water, butter, corn and cheese.

Mr. Lazaro and Jose E. need to repair the oven where they make the bricks.

The greatest wish of each group member is for their businesses to grow more, and to be able to enter into new markets.

They need their income in order to get their families ahead.

loans.use: the purchase of soil, sand, firewood, used clothing, cheese, rennet tablets,  lime, water, butter, corn, and cheese.

payments.comment: Over-reported by partner.  Reduced to local price.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: the construction of a room

loans.name: Julio Cesar

texts.es: El Sr. Julio Cesar es una persona muy seria y responsable el esta casado y tiene un niño, a el Sr. Julio le preocupa el bienestar de su patrimonio para su familia, el Sr. Julio quiere el préstamo por que quiere pintar su casa tanto interiormente como exteriormente ya que hace tiempo que no tenia la oportunidad de arreglar su casa,  el es muy responsable.
texts.en: Mr. Julio Cesar is a very serious and responsible person. He is married and has one child, and he is very concerned about his family's well-being and his finances. Julio would like this loan because he wants to paint his house, inside and outside, since it has been a long time since he has been able to fix up his home. He is very responsible.

loans.use: to paint his home

payments.comment: Over-reported by partner.  Reduced to local price.

loans.name: Adela Del Carmen

texts.es: La señora Adela tiene 60 años con  2 hijos menores de edad que está a su cargo. Ella se dedica a una pulpería en su casa de habitación, Allí vende desde granos básicos hasta golosinas para llamar la atención de los clientes que habitan cerca. Esta no es la primera vez que tiene financiamientos para su negocio. Ella ya tiene 14 años de dedicarse a este negocio, empezó vendiendo solamente golosinas, el negocio ha podido ir prosperando y así convertirlo en una pulpería más grande. Este crédito será invertido en la compra de granos básicos tal como arroz, fríjol, azúcar y aceite principalmente. Su sueño es llegar a ver su negocio con más productos, más surtido con productos que demanda la población, para brindar más facilidades económicas a sus hijos y que puedan prepararse en la universidad.
texts.en:
Adela is 60 and has 2 young children under her care. She has a general store in her home. There she sells everything from basic grains to candies, in order to capture the attention of the customers who live nearby. This is not her first loan for her business. She has had this business for 14 years. She started off only selling candies. Her business prospered, and so she was able to convert it into a larger general store. 

This loan will be invested mainly in the purchase of basic grains such as rice, and beans, sugar and oil. Her dream is to see her business stocked with more products that are in demand in order to offer her children more economic benefits. She hopes that they will be able to attend university.

loans.use: working capital

loans.name: Ivan Marcelino

texts.es:
El socio pertenece al banco comunal “MUJERES  UNIDAS”; El banco está ubicado en el distrito de Cusco, perteneciente a la provincia de Cusco y departamento de Cusco.

El socio es el Sr. Iván Marcelino; el tiene 26 años de edad y es conviviente  y tiene 1 hijo; el socio se dedica a brindar el servicio de taxi, el trabaja todos los días por las mañanas y tardes siendo esta la única actividad que realiza por el momento y de esta forma saca a su familia adelante. El socio es una persona bien optimista y con muchas ganas de seguir adelante. 

El socio solicita el préstamo para realizar el mantenimiento de su carro y comprar algunos accesorios que le hace falta. 

El socio está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota
texts.en:
The member belongs to the Mujeres Unidas communal bank located in Cusco district, Cusco province in Cusco district.

He is Iván Marcelino, 26, and he lives with his common-law wife and they have a son.  He has a taxi service and works daily in the mornings and afternoons.   This is his only work at the moment.  With the taxi service he is able to get his family ahead and being a very optimistic person,  he enthusiastically is working towards this goal.

Iván is requesting this loan for the upkeep of his car and to buy some accessories that he needs.

He is happy because of the loan and promises to make the payments in the established time period.

loans.use: Iván is requesting this loan for the upkeep of his car and to buy some accessories that he needs.

loans.name: María Angélica

texts.es:
María Angélica forma parte del banco comunal Millaray, perteneciente a la ciudad de Temuco. Ella, junto a su mamá, tienen una pensión que funciona todo el año. Durante enero y febrero (período de vacaciones para los estudiantes) su pensión funciona para viajeros o visitantes de la ciudad. Cuenta con 7 habitaciones y servicio completo (comida y aseo). La ubicación de este negocio es muy buena, ya que se encuentra cerca de 3 universidades, un casino y un mall. Esta pensión es de su mamá hace 20 años. María Angélica es dueña de 3 piezas, por lo que el arriendo de éstas es su ganancia.
María Angélica tiene una hija de 15, con quien vive, en la misma pensión. 
María había pensado independizarse de su mamá, pero cuando falleció su papá, decidió quedarse a trabajar con ella para ayudarle y acompañarla.
Ellas dos se dedican a la mantención completa de la pensión: aseo, comida, compras y administración.
Con este préstamo comprará alimentos para estar preparada para atender sus clientes y huéspedes de verano (enero y febrero). 
Su sueño es seguir con el negocio y mantener un buen servicio para que nunca le falten los clientes.
Temuco es la capital de la región de la Araucanía. La ciudad se ubica a 670 kilómetros al sur de Santiago (capital de Chile). En sus alrededores se ubican una serie de balnearios lacustres (Pucón, Villarrica) y una flora y fauna nativa muy llamativas, concentrada en parques naturales cercanos. Cabe destacar que en esta región habita el 50% de los mapuches, pueblo indígena, existente en nuestro país.
texts.en:
María Angélica is part of the Millaray community bank and lives in Temuco. She and her mother have a boarding house that operates year-round. During January and February (when students are on vacation) their boarding house is used by travelers or visitors to the city. It has 7 rooms and full service (dining and cleaning). This business has a very good location, since it is near 3 universities, a casino, and a mall. This boarding house has been her mother's for 20 years. María Angélica runs 3 rooms, so their rent is her income. María Angélica has a 15-year-old daughter who lives with her in the boarding house.
María had thought about becoming independent from her mother, but when her father died, she decided to stay and work with her to help her and keep her company.
Both women completely maintain the boarding house: cleaning, food, purchases, and management.
With this loan, she will buy food to be ready to serve her summer customers and guests (January and February).
Her dream is to continue with the business and maintain good service so that her customers are never lacking.
Temuco is the capital of the Araucanía region. The city is located 670 kilometers south of Santiago (the capital of Chile). The surrounding area has a series of lakeside resorts (Pucón, Villarrica) and very attractive native flora and fauna, concentrated in nearby natural parks. It is worth noting that 50% of the Mapuches, an indigenous group, in this country live in this region.

loans.use: Food

loans.name: Juana Angelica

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal” MUJERES UNIDAS”; El banco está ubicado en el distrito de Cusco, perteneciente a la provincia de Cusco y departamento de Cusco.

La socia es la Sra. Juana Angélica; ella tiene 34 años de edad, conviviente y tiene 2 hijos; La socia alterna sus actividades diarias con el negocio de compra y venta de ropa ,la socia viaja hasta la ciudad de Lima para poder comprar mercadería para luego venderlo a sus clientes que le solicitan como sus vecinos, amistades y familiares, 
la socia lleva un buen tiempo en este negocio y de esta forma saca a su familia adelante.

La socia solicita el préstamo para la compra de más productos para su negocio y así poder tener más variedad para ofrecer a sus clientes.

La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
The member belongs to the Mujeres Unidas communal bank located in Cusco district, Cusco province in Cusco district.

She is Juana Angélica, 34, and she lives with her common-law husband and they have two children..  The member alternates her daily activities with her business of buying and selling clothing.  She travels as far as Lima to buy merchandise so that she can then sell the requested items  to her customers, such as her neighbors, friends and relatives.  She has been in the business for a good while and this is the way she gets her family ahead. 

 Juana Angélica is requesting the loan to buy more products for her business and thus she will be able to offer a greater variety to her customers.

She is happy because of the loan and promises to make the payments in the established time period.

loans.use: She is requesting the loan to buy more products for her business and thus she will be able to offer a greater variety to her customers.

loans.name: Clerida Yaneth

texts.es:
la señora Clerida Yaneth A. tiene 43 años de edad esta casada con el señor Damian Marquina.
Clerida se dedica a la venta de productos de consumo popular, su esposo se dedica a la reparacion de bicicletas.
tienen dos hijos.
sus clientes son personas que trabajan en las empresas cañeras y meloneras de la region.
 
el credito lo utilizara para comprar mercaderia para surtir su negocio.

doña clerida es una mujer muy calmada y respetuosa, en sus tiempos libres le gusta jugar con sus dos
hijos, vive muy cerca de su mama y la visita casi todo los dias.
texts.en:
Clerida Yaneth A. is 43 years old and is married to Damian Marquina.  They have two children.

Clerinda sells popular use products, while her husband repairs bicycles.  Her customers are workers from the sugar cane and melon processing plants within the region.

She will use the money from this loan to buy items with which to stock her business.  Clerida is a calm and well respected woman who likes to play with her two children in her spare time.  She lives very close to her mother and visits her every day.

loans.use: Inventory

loans.name: Inés

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal” MUJERES UNIDAS”; El banco está ubicado en el distrito de Cusco, perteneciente a la provincia de Cusco y departamento de Cusco.

La socia es la Sra. Inés; ella tiene 63 años de edad, casada y tiene 6 hijos; La socia alterna sus actividades diarias con el negocio de tienda de abarrotes la socia vende todo tipo de productos entre ellos productos de primera necesidad como arroz, azúcar y leche, la socia lleva años en este negocio y de esta forma saca a su familia adelante y se siente feliz ya que este negocio le trae muchas satisfaciones y aparte la socia cuenta con la ayuda de sus hijos.

La socia solicita el préstamo para la compra de más productos para su negocio y así poder tener más variedad para ofrecer a sus clientes como golosinas, fideos, productos de primera necesidad entre otros más.

La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
